# Function replace_pattern()

Scan a dataframe and return it with all occurencies of a `pattern` changed to `replacement`, keeping the same format.


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
dataset <- data.frame(a=as.factor(letters)[1:7],b=letters[1:7],c=1:7,stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
unite("fus",a,b,remove=FALSE,sep="")

dataset %>% replace_pattern("a",'"XXX') %>% summary()


```

Exact matching with argument `exact`

```{r}

dataset %>% replace_pattern("a",'"XXX', exact = TRUE)

```
